topic.title: Response Odometer Reading Organizer - conformance rules

lines.i: Collection of odometer readings at various points in an EMS crew's trip

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.97"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10626)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Beginning Odometer Reading (CONF:10630)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10627)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response On Scene Odometer Reading (CONF:10634)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10628)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Destination Odometer Reading (CONF:10638)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10629)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Ending Odometer Reading (CONF:10642)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10626)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Beginning Odometer Reading (CONF:10630)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10627)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response On Scene Odometer Reading (CONF:10634)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10628)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Destination Odometer Reading (CONF:10638)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10629)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Ending Odometer Reading (CONF:10642)
